timeline.bodyText: Shouldn't there be a sleep here?
timeline.author: Maithem

replies.bodyText: And a max timeout wait before the test fails so that it doesn't keep on spinning indefinitely.
replies.author: Maithem

replies.bodyText:
There could be a sleep. The thing is the transition happens in the line right after the listener is notified that the lock was acquired. So technically it shouldn't be spinning for too long. It's just the interleaving between threads...
Also, regarding the timeout. Isn't it covered by the max time of each test? otherwise it times out.
